name: A Christmas Adventure
description:
Welcome to my first game published on itch. You have to deliver presents and coal in 5 different areas, and then defeat the evil person. There are many different puzzles and hard jumps, but this is a short adventure, depending how good you are at platformers. Join me, Sam, and deliver the gifts and coal to some characters that might be Easter eggs for new content, and there's a skip secret somewhere.

Controls And Physics:

jump=space

move=left/right keys

climb=up or down, up to latch

Present=give to responding # person, hint... there are numbers floating around

Coal=give to responding # naughty person, same as floating numbers

No-present zone = sometimes there's a weird divider that looks red, pink, and white, when a present collides with it... the present goes to the players spawn.

Go to spawn in level= press r, e and s, then you go back to the spawn of the level, but in the boss, it resets entirely.

Quit level= press q and e to exit a level if you get tired or enraged.

Ice= makes you slip... k

i think that's all... Enjoy!!!!!

Made with love, Samkid123.
